documents.document: @kednar what... you mean thats not the next Ariane series rocket?

@blahblahellis i must save this tweet for later
@TerriReports @RACQ_LifeFlight @zonca @abcbrisbane my daughters were holding their breaths listening this morning. Can't wait to show them
@whereisdaz generally give audience Qs that you go on to answer later. Intrigue is key, 7min average on 730report is long when subject dull
@whereisdaz audience is broad but stays same. Story subject drives structure. But tv is picture lead so you have to grab eyes at start.
@whereisdaz thank you
@whereisdaz is the order dependent on the form, speech or written etc? Or is it based on the story structure?

@Rubicon_Paul doh. Of course. Does it get dev love tho?
@Rubicon_Paul i wonder how to suggest it as a feature? On the mailing list i suppose as i dont irc
@Rubicon_Paul ayes thank you. I'm using vert emission so i matched vert count - particle count. Would be nice to clamp emission value tho
@faaaaarck yeah ok that fixed it, thanks :D Seems like it would be nice to have a clamp for that value if you want it limited tho #b3d
@faaaaarck is there a way to limit emission frames/verts to particle count tho?

@Daniel_Loxton yes parenting and reality of loss. And loss of my youth, realizing that I'm supposed to pass the torch. Damn im crying now

@gleb_alexandrov you know what some asked after class... where can we get it!? They love the idea of free as its empowering to kids
@gleb_alexandrov kids are always fascinated by #b3d and love realtime examples. They most loved seeing a ball animation over their school
